channel.title: Upgrade cache
channel.description:
I added a few models and ofc only I can see them yet..
But I rejarred and changed the cache in cachedownloader etc to my new cache.
but I doesn't upgrade the cache for others..
Maybe if they delete the cache,, but I can't tell my whole server to delete the cache..
how to upgrade it for everybody without delete the cache?

item.title: Upgrade cache
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

I did, I changed the cache in cachedownloader. after that I rejarred the whole client.

and placed the new jar on the webclient.

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrade cache
item.dc:creator: @im_here im here
item.description:
@im_here wrote:

reupload ur client and webclient with new cache and post in ur website ur new ver of client and ur done ihope thats helped u
